page.title: 10LOCAL PEOPLE COMMENT
page.content: Anne,a nurse,is in favour of today's technology and of the use of computers.She does not agree with them being used for maths.because she believes you would not exactly be learning anything.She likes modern clothes,but doesn't like the shops around Stockingford. Mr.Cross,when asked what he thought of the government,laughed and then replied,"Not very much."He thought the emergency services were excellent. Mrs.Deakin did not think very much of the government.She thought children were passable,and that the public services are not bad. Mr.Albrighton did not think much to the government,but thought the emergency services were not bad.He thinks there are too many shops.Both he and his wife are retired.
